questionBody.p: Which sentence shows the best usage of the word furthermore?

simpleChoice.p: The waiter forgot to bring the bread furthermore. He brought Ethan the wrong dessert.
The waiter forgot to bring the bread. Furthermore, he brought Ethan the wrong dessert.
The waiter furthermore forgot to bring the bread. He brought Ethan the wrong dessert.
The waiter forgot to bring the bread. He brought Ethan furthermore the wrong dessert.
